---
## PR Review: feat/web-dashboard-shell

### Review Checklist

- [x] Read AGENTS.md for project conventions
- [x] Review authentication and security patterns
- [x] Review Discord utilities and API handling
- [x] Review components and UI patterns
- [x] Review tests for coverage and correctness
- [x] Check Docker and deployment configuration
- [x] Submit final review verdict

### Summary

I've completed a thorough review of this PR. The code demonstrates excellent security practices, comprehensive error handling, and proper testing.

**Key Findings:**
- ✅ Authentication properly configured with token refresh and error propagation
- ✅ Open redirect protection in login page
- ✅ Security headers (HSTS, X-Frame-Options, etc.) configured
- ✅ Access token kept server-side only
- ✅ Discord API rate limiting and pagination handled correctly
- ✅ AbortController cleanup for cancelled requests
- ✅ 92% test coverage (exceeds 80% threshold)
- ✅ Multi-stage Docker build with non-root user

### Verdict

✅ **Approved** - No issues found. Well-structured foundation for the web dashboard.

---

INSTRUCTIONS: Evaluate this email. If important (login codes, billing, payments, action required, replies to Bill, package tracking), DM Bill using: message action=send channel=discord target=user:191633014441115648 message="brief summary". If not important (marketing, newsletters, spam, test emails from himself, Google security alerts about new sign-ins/devices, GitHub PR comments/reviews/CI notifications), reply NO_REPLY. SKIP all Google Security Alert emails. SKIP all GitHub notification emails about PR comments, reviews, code review requests, CI/CD status, and issue comments. Auto-track any package tracking numbers with 17TRACK.
